title: Serious Game-Based Elementary Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Course for elementary school teachers to acquire practical math instruction methods applicable in real classroom settings.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to apply mathematical concepts by solving problems in a game environment simulating real classroom situations.
Learners master the process of analyzing mathematical tasks and designing/implementing solutions using an inquiry-based learning model.
Learners develop and practice learner-customized math instruction strategies through role-based tasks in game scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
